name: Mayarani Sola Silpalaya
overview: Mayarani Sola Silpalaya was established as a Sole Proprietorship firm in the year 2002. We conduct all our business operations from the famous city Kolkata which is also the capital of West Bengal, India. Our organization has been into manufacturing, exporting and supplying of Sola Balls, Sola Sticks and Dried Flowers which are used in decoration. Our products range include Jute Sticks, Pine Sticks, Cane Sticks, Bell Cups Flowers, Sola Rose Flowers, Sola Lotus Flowers, Sola Dalhia Flowers, Sola Shell Flowers, Sola Wood Flowers, Sola Tip Balls, Sola Chips Balls, Sola Flower Balls. Decoration is an integral part of any occasion and being humans we always wish to decorate our houses and places of leisure or work. All products manufactured by us are in huge demand in market due to the superb quality and magical craftsmanship used in the process of manufacturing. Our manufactured products have proven their worth not only in domestic market but have gained a good foothold in foreign as well.
